fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
Watch (day, 5 uses): Select a player during the day, you will become that players secretary for the night.
Examine (night, infinite uses): Allow the night action of your target’s targetters to go through immediately, or deny them. You will be told the actions.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Nothing you do will count as a visit.
You must use your ability every day, or you will die.

fields.name: Mechanics:
fields.value: Targetters of your target will have their action resolve immediately, with you being the deciding factor on if it goes through or not. This cannot be evaded, and targetters may not switch targets if they hit a secretary’s target.
